statements: SELECT * FROM SoilHealthIndex;
SELECT id, pH, nitrogen FROM SoilHealthIndex WHERE phosphorus > 3;
SELECT id, organic_matter, magnesium FROM SoilHealthIndex WHERE calcium < 2;
SELECT id, nitrogen, potassium FROM SoilHealthIndex WHERE pH BETWEEN 6.0 AND 7.0;
SELECT id, phosphorus, calcium FROM SoilHealthIndex WHERE organic_matter > 2.5 AND magnesium < 1.5;
SELECT id, pH, nitrogen FROM SoilHealthIndex WHERE phosphorus > 10 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, organic_matter, phosphorus FROM SoilHealthIndex WHERE nitrogen < 5 ORDER BY nitrogen ASC, id DESC
SELECT id, pH, potassium FROM SoilHealthIndex WHERE calcium > 7 AND magnesium < 3 ORDER BY pH ASC, id ASC
SELECT id, nitrogen, phosphorus, potassium FROM SoilHealthIndex WHERE organic_matter BETWEEN 2.5 AND 5.0 ORDER BY nitrogen DESC, phosphorus ASC
SELECT id, calcium, magnesium FROM SoilHealthIndex WHERE phosphorus < 2 OR potassium > 6 ORDER BY calcium DESC, id ASC
SELECT * FROM soil_parameters;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM soil_parameters ORDER BY parameter_name;
SELECT sample_date, moisture_level, nutrient_level FROM soil_samples WHERE pH_level > 6;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM soil_samples;
SELECT sample_date, nutrient_level FROM soil_samples WHERE moisture_level < 0.5 ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM soil_parameters;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM soil_parameters ORDER BY parameter_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM soil_samples WHERE pH_level > 6.5 ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT parameter_id, parameter_name, AVG(parameter_value) AS avg_value FROM soil_parameters GROUP BY parameter_id, parameter_name;
SELECT s.sample_id, s.sample_date, p.parameter_name, s.moisture_level, s.nutrient_level, s.pH_level FROM soil_samples s JOIN soil_parameters p ON s.parameter_id = p.parameter_id;
SELECT * FROM SoilHealthIndex;
SELECT id, parameter1, parameter2 FROM SoilHealthIndex ORDER BY parameter1 DESC;
SELECT id, nutrient_type, nutrient_level FROM SoilNutrients WHERE soil_id = 1;
SELECT moisture_level, measurement_date FROM SoilMoisture ORDER BY measurement_date ASC;
SELECT id, parameter3 FROM SoilHealthIndex WHERE parameter3 > 5;
SELECT parameter1, parameter2 FROM SoilHealthIndex WHERE id = 1;
SELECT nutrient_type, nutrient_level FROM SoilNutrients WHERE soil_id = 3 ORDER BY nutrient_level DESC;
SELECT moisture_level, measurement_date FROM SoilMoisture ORDER BY measurement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SoilMoisture WHERE soil_id = 2 AND moisture_level > 50;
SELECT id, parameter3 FROM SoilHealthIndex WHERE parameter1 > 5 AND parameter2 < 10;
SELECT * FROM soil_health_index WHERE id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, crop_yield FROM crop_data ORDER BY crop_yield DESC;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT id, timestamp, action FROM monitoring_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT parameter1, parameter2, parameter3, parameter4 FROM soil_health_index WHERE parameter1 > 5 AND parameter2 < 10;
SELECT * FROM soil_health_index WHERE parameter1 > 5 ORDER BY parameter2 DESC, parameter3 ASC
SELECT id, crop_name FROM crop_data WHERE crop_yield > 1000 AND soil_type = 'Silty Clay'
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25 AND 30 AND humidity < 60
SELECT * FROM monitoring_log WHERE action LIKE '%update%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, parameter1, parameter3 FROM soil_health_index WHERE parameter2 < 3 OR parameter4 > 8
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples;
SELECT date_collected, ph_level FROM SoilSamples ORDER BY date_collected DESC;
SELECT nutrient_name, nutrient_description FROM SoilNutrients WHERE nutrient_id = 2;
SELECT temperature FROM TemperatureRecords WHERE date_recorded >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sample_id, moisture_content FROM SoilMoisture WHERE moisture_content >= 0.5;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples ORDER BY date_collected DESC, ph_level ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sample_id, ph_level, moisture_level FROM SoilSamples WHERE ph_level > 6 AND moisture_level < 0.5;
SELECT nutrient_name, nutrient_description FROM SoilNutrients WHERE LENGTH(nutrient_description) > 50;
SELECT * FROM SoilMoisture m JOIN SoilSamples s ON m.sample_id = s.sample_id WHERE m.moisture_content > 0.3 ORDER BY s.date_collected LIMIT 5;

SELECT s.sample_id, s.date_collected, sqi.overall_health_index FROM SoilSamples s JOIN SoilQualityIndex sqi ON s.sample_id = sqi.sample_id WHERE sqi.overall_health_index > 80 ORDER BY s.date_collected DESC;
